title: Ankara
summary: Ankara (/ˈæŋkərə/ ANK-ə-rə, US also /ˈɑːŋ-/ AHNK-ə-rə; Turkish: [ˈaŋkaɾa] (listen)),[lower-alpha 1] historically known as Ancyra[lower-alpha 2] and Angora,[8][lower-alpha 3] is the capital of Turkey. Located in the central part of Anatolia, the city has a population of 4.5 million in its urban center and over 5.6 million in Ankara Province,[10] making it Turkey's second-largest city after Istanbul.
